query: SELECT s.id, s.name, COUNT(DISTINCT lm.id) as totalModules, COUNT(DISTINCT lt.id) as totalTopics FROM subjects s LEFT JOIN learningModules lm ON lm.subjectId = s.id LEFT JOIN learningTopics lt ON lt.moduleId = lm.id WHERE s.name LIKE '%Segurança%' GROUP BY s.id, s.name;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute SELECT s.id, s.name, COUNT(DISTINCT lm.id) as totalModules, COUNT(DISTINCT lt.id) as totalTopics FROM subjects s LEFT JOIN learningModules lm ON lm.subjectId = s.id LEFT JOIN learningTopics lt ON lt.moduleId = lm.id WHERE s.name LIKE '%Segurança%' GROUP BY s.id, s.name;
